title: Advanced Electric Vehicle Technology
description: Comprehensive training on Škoda's electric vehicle lineup including the Enyaq iV. Covers battery technology, charging infrastructure, and maintenance procedures.
formatted_text:
Course: Advanced Electric Vehicle Technology
Course ID: SKODA-001
Category: Technical
Level: Advanced
Duration: 5 days
Instructor: Dr. Jan Novák

Description: Comprehensive training on Škoda's electric vehicle lineup including the Enyaq iV. Covers battery technology, charging infrastructure, and maintenance procedures.

Topics covered: Battery systems, Charging technology, Maintenance, Diagnostics
